臨.definition: to face; to overlook; to arrive; to be (just) about to; just before

臨了.definition: at the last moment; right at the end

臨危.definition: dying (from illness); facing death; on one's deathbed

臨危受命.definition: (idiom) to take on a leadership role at a time of crisis

臨危授命.definition: to sacrifice one's life in a crisis

臨問.definition: to go personally to consult subordinates (of a high official)
